title: Extraction of singletons incorrect
body:
https://github.com/YanisChrys/borrelia_workflow/blob/da58b96677640b813342316d4568c8d0a1d6e8c3/snakefiles/mapping2.smk#L49

Use flags (excluding all of these):
- read paired (0x1)
- read unmapped (0x4)

So `-G 5`

Also check if it's necessary to exclude:
- not primary alignment
- read fails platform/vendor quality checks
- read is PCR or optical duplicate
- supplementary alignment

title: Extraction of paired reads should include mapped only
body:
https://github.com/YanisChrys/borrelia_workflow/blob/da58b96677640b813342316d4568c8d0a1d6e8c3/snakefiles/mapping2.smk#L49

Use flags (*including* all of these):
- read paired (0x1)
- read mapped in proper pair (0x2)

So `-f 3`

Also check for duplicates, in which case secondary alignments will need to be excluded (`-F 2048`)
